titleStmt.title: Proposals for printing (by subscription) an exposition on the whole book of Canticles, by the late reverend and learned divine John Davenport of New-England recommended by the persons undernam'd, and a specimen of the said book annex'd.
titleStmt.author: Annesley, Samuel, 1620?-1696.
Veel, Edward, 1632?-1708.

notesStmt.note: At foot: The undertaker is Thomas Cockerill, at the Three Legs in the Poultrey.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
